ResourceHeader.Description: The Magnetic Field Experiment (MFE) includes a fluxgate magnetometer sensor mounted on a 2 meter boom [Potemra et al., IEEE Trans. Geosci. Remote Sensing, vol. GE-23, 246, 1985]. The fluxgate sensor was sampled at a rate of 8 vector samples/s. The data span the entire AMPTE/CCE mission, from 1984 day 234, August 21, through 1989 day 009 with occasional data gaps. A lengthy data gap occurred in 1986 from day 252, September 9, ~1300UT through day 286, October 12, ~1800UT, during an extended eclipse period. For more details, see T. A. Potemra et al., IEEE Transactions on Geoscience and Remote Sensing, v. GE-23, p. 246, 1985.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: User will acknowledge the AMPTE/CCE magnetometer team in any publication resulting from the use of these data.
